alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Hardeman; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 8:11AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Clay, Archer, southwestern Wichita, Wilbarger, eastern Baylor and east central Hardeman Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 811 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Chillicothe to 6 miles southeast of Mabelle. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Archer City, Electra, Holliday, Chillicothe, Scotland, Windthorst, Megargel, Lake Diversion, Dundee, Westover, Harrold, Lockett, Lake Kemp, Mabelle, Oklaunion, Mankins, Grayback, Lake Kickapoo, and southwestern Lake Arrowhead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Archer; Baylor; Clay; Hardeman; Wichita; Wilbarger
